allow:
Bash(PYTHONPATH=. python3 -c "
from integrations.azure_services import AzureServicesManager
import asyncio

async def check_azure_data():
    manager = AzureServicesManager()
    # Check Azure Blob Storage containers
    storage_client = manager.storage_client
    containers = await storage_client.list_containers()
    print(''Azure Blob Storage containers:'')
    for container in containers:
        print(f''  - {container.name}'')
    
    # Check Azure Cognitive Search indices
    search_client = manager.search_client
    indices = await search_client.list_indices()
    print(''Azure Cognitive Search indices:'')
    for index in indices:
        print(f''  - {index.name}'')

asyncio.run(check_azure_data())
")
